text: Motion
Motion

Hey Producer,
can I check something with you?

Sure,
when?
Next weekend!
Hmm?
Isn't that your day off?
Yeah, no work scheduled for that day, right? Just confirming...

Yeah...
As of now, there's no plan for work.
I see! Good to know...!

Confirming no work means you've got something
important planned for that day, huh? What's up?
Yeah!
I'm helping out with club activities!

A friend of mine in my class is going
to play in a practice match next time!
I made a promise to practice with them!
That's right, that's an unmissable plan...!

Okay, I'll make a note that
Meguru is a definite no-go.
Is that okay!?
Of course.

Idol work is important,
but so is personal time.
I'm sure there are times when you just have to be sorry.

I'll try to adjust things as much as possible
on my end, so don't hesitate to let me know.
I see...!

Well then,
can I ask you one more thing...?
Yeah, what is it?

I was thinking it would be nice if you could
come support us at the practice match...

Oh, I see. If you're practicing together,
it makes sense you'd want support too!
When is the match?

Let's see... 
Just a moment!
It's the first Sunday of next month!

Since there's no work scheduled yet,
I was hoping...

...Yeah,
I think it'll be fine.
Really!?
Yeah, really.

It's still a bit ahead, so I'll make sure not to schedule
anything, so you can go cheer with peace of mind.
Yay!!
Thank you, Producer!

No, no,
I just don't schedule anything unless necessary.
But still!

Participating in the practice match as a first-year is a
big deal, so I really wanted to go watch!

Work seems more exciting than usual!
Hehehe.
